cab.content: 11 gl !. 'ThisHis Bi(P 5213) i'Vom Secretary of Slate to Viceroy, Foreign Department,V - ' uh July mo.- Clear the line.Your telegram of 3rd July, 812 S. Afghanistan. Your proposals as to reply to Afghans in event of their making official representations in sense indicated by I)obbs are approved. No objection to offer of gifts mentioned in last paragraph your telegram provided necessary articles, &c. are forthcoming. I have telegraphed separately as to this.
